cross_sections_utils.py¶

Useful things that didn’t really fit anywhere.

cross_sections.cross_sections_utils.dot_in_fmt = '{run_name}\n{state_name}\n{naming_str}\n{n_bound_resultant} ! Number of bound states for composite nucleus\n{n_scattering_resultant} ! Number of scattering states for composite nucleus\n{target_A} {target_Z} {target_gs_J2} {target_gs_parity} {target_gs_T2} {n_bound_target} ! Target info: A, Z, ground state 2J, parity, 2T\n{targ_bound_str}\n{proj_A} {proj_Z} {proj_gs_J2} {proj_gs_parity} {proj_gs_T2} {n_bound_proj} ! Projectile info: A, Z, ground state 2J, parity, 2T\n{target_A} {target_Z} {target_gs_J2} {target_gs_parity} {target_gs_T2} {n_bound_target} ! Target info: A, Z, ground state 2J, parity, 2T\n{targ_bound_str}\n{proj_A} {proj_Z} {proj_gs_J2} {proj_gs_parity} {proj_gs_T2} {n_bound_proj} ! Projectile info: A, Z, ground state 2J, parity, 2T\n{hw} ! Frequency used in NCSM calculation\n{r_matching} ! Matching radius\n{r_zero} ! Cutoff radius, after which wavefunction ~0\n{n_points} ! Number of points to use for integration\n{nsig_min} {nsig_max} {lamb_min} {lamb_max} ! nsig_min,nsig_max,lamb_min,lamb_max\n\n{Rp} {Rn} {Rm} ! targ Rp, Rn, Rm\n\n{e_lines}\n{m_lines}\n{Emin} {Emax} {Estep} ! Emin, Emax, dE\n{Eexpt} ! Eexpt\n'¶

The format of the transitions_NCSMC.in file

cross_sections.cross_sections_utils.get_A_Z(name)¶

Get A and Z for a given atomic name

name:

string, of the form “Li8”

cross_sections.cross_sections_utils.get_state_name(state)¶

if state = e.g., “3 -1 3” this will return the corresponding state_name, e.g., state_name = “3m”

state:

string, of the form “3 -1 3”

cross_sections.cross_sections_utils.is_float(string)¶

Check if a string can be cast to a float

string:

a string shocking, I know
